person.persName: John Downing, Jr. (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and farmer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and farmer. Maryland, native. Married to Harriet Hurst Downing in Jefferson County on September 27, 1842. Father of Louisa Downing, Anna Downing, John Downing, Adele Downing, Sallie K. Downing, Amelia M. Downing, William H. Downing, Kate L. Downing, and Ella B. Downing. Clerk in Louisville in 1850. Farmer in Louisville in 1860.
